projects.name: Awesome CL - React Component Library
projects.shortDescription: A reusable React component library designed to optimize development and improve efficiency in building interfaces. A collaborative project developed in 7 weeks as part of the Full Stack Developer course.
projects.description: Awesome CL is a React component library created to provide a collection of reusable elements that streamline web application development. This project was developed as part of a Full Stack Developer course by a team of six members over seven weeks.The idea arose from the need to consolidate the knowledge gained about React by applying principles of reusability, modularity, and interactive documentation. The library enables developers to integrate components seamlessly, ensuring a consistent and efficient experience in their projects.
projects.problem: Building interfaces from scratch can be tedious and repetitive. This library helps reduce development time by providing ready-to-use and well-documented components, making integration into any React project easier.

myRol.title: My Role in the Project
list: Designed the project architecture, ensuring a scalable and modular structure.
Developed the data storage logic and how components are dynamically rendered in the documentation.
Implemented an interactive system that displays real-time examples of each component, making them easier to learn and use.

challenges.title: Challenges & Learnings
list: Coordinating teamwork and defining a clear architecture to ensure scalability.
Implementing interactive documentation that allows users to test components without installing the library.
Optimizing component loading and rendering to improve performance.

projects.name: HM Service - Informational Website for a Service Company
projects.shortDescription: Professional website for a company offering moving, home repair, and furniture assembly services. Includes full branding, UX/UI design, and development, with corporate email integration.
projects.description: HM Service is an informational website created for a newly founded company offering moving, home repair, and furniture assembly services, among others. The goal was to provide a professional and visually appealing online presence that allows potential clients to learn about the company’s services and contact the business easily. Beyond the website development, I was responsible for the complete branding, designing the logo and its different versions. I also configured corporate emails using Zoho Mail to ensure a professional and organized communication system.
projects.problem: A new business needs credibility and an effective way to connect with its customers. This website helps the company present itself professionally and provides clear, accessible information about its services, along with direct contact options.

myRol.title: My Role in the Project
list: Full branding creation, including logo design.
UX/UI design of the entire website.
Configuration and management of corporate emails (info@, noreply@, contact@ using Zoho Mail).

challenges.title: Challenges & Learnings
list: Creating an attractive and professional design that reflects the company’s identity.
Optimizing the website’s structure for better navigation and user experience.
Integrating corporate emails to enhance client communication.

projects.name: Havenova - PWA for Service Request and Users Management
projects.shortDescription: A web platform for managing service requests, reservations, and customer interactions for a home services business. Includes automated email notifications, a dynamic dashboard, and a seamless booking experience.
projects.description: Havenova is a web-based platform designed to streamline the management of service requests and customer interactions for a home services company. The platform allows users to submit service requests, receive confirmations, and manage appointments seamlessly. The backend includes a robust email system powered by SendGrid, sending automated notifications for verification, password resets, service confirmations, promotions, and blog updates. The project is currently in development, with plans to integrate an advanced admin dashboard for service management and customer analytics.
projects.problem: Many small service businesses struggle with efficiently handling customer inquiries, service requests, and appointment scheduling. This platform provides a structured system to manage these processes efficiently while improving customer communication through automated emails.

myRol.title: My Role in the Project
list: Full-stack development, including frontend and backend architecture.
Integration of automated email notifications using SendGrid.
Implementation of authentication and account verification systems.
Development of a service request and appointment scheduling system.
Design and optimization of a structured database for user and service management.
Creation of a responsive and user-friendly UI for seamless customer interactions.

challenges.title: Challenges & Learnings
list: Designing a scalable system to handle various service requests and interactions.
Implementing a secure authentication system with email verification.
Ensuring reliable email delivery for transactional and promotional emails.
Developing a flexible and modular backend to support future feature expansions.

projects.info: The project is currently under development and will be updated with new features.

During an orientation course at DCI, I discovered the fascinating world of web development, which inspired me to pursue a career as a full-stack web developer. This path has allowed me to be creative again and tackle problems from innovative perspectives. Throughout the course, I have expanded my knowledge of building web applications, gaining a solid understanding of their technical requirements. Additionally, I was selected to be part of the DCI tutoring program, where I had the opportunity to support my classmates in their studies and projects. This experience not only allowed me to collaborate with exceptional people but also to learn from them and enhance my interpersonal skills.
